page.title: 04LOCAL INDUSTRY 04160531
page.content:
Dyson Refractories are concerned with making high quality bricks used for furnaces.The works are divided into four main plants:the{Alumina Plant mostly makes furnace bricks for the glass and steel industries.The {Isostatic Plant}makes electrodes which line the furnaces to heat the glass for the glass industry.The{Catalyst {Plant}makes catalysts which go to purify gas,petro_chemicals and perfumes.The{Nozzle Plant}makes nozzles for the steel works.Dyson Refractories cater for a highly specialised market.Although competition is fierce,especially from the Japanese,the company is doing extremely well to compete on a world wide basis.They supply for example 85% of the world market with electrodes.
